ModMetaData.name: Water Spring Mod
ModMetaData.author: rodrigoschott
ModMetaData.description:
A mod that adds a new buildable item called "Water Spring" which generates "Flowing Water" that spreads over time, simulating basic water diffusion using a simplified model inspired by Dwarf Fortress.
Features: - Buildable Water Spring that generates water over configurable intervals - Water diffusion between tiles based on a simplified physics model - Configurable settings for water generation and diffusion rates
This is a prototype mod demonstrating a basic fluid simulation system in RimWorld.
